scripts.faas:build: yarn build && faas-cli template pull https://github.com/thrashplay/openfaas-templates --overwrite && faas-cli build -f function.yaml
scripts.get-pod-name: kubectl -n openfaas-fn get pod --no-headers --output custom-columns=:{.metadata.name} --sort-by={.status.startTime} -l faas_function=git-poller | tail -1
scripts.logs: yarn run --silent get-pod-name | xargs kubectl -n openfaas-fn logs -f
scripts.test: echo "Package does not have any tests!" && exit 0
